channel.title: Changing skill problem
channel.description:
I got demise source but one problem that i need to be solfed is that. When some is wearing gear they can still change there stats.
Normale ur stats are 1/1. I wanna change that to 99/99 when wearing stuff. Thats aloud i want that so it is not possible
Thanks guys.
